Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    com.mumfrey.liteloader.transformers.PacketTransformer
    This transformer will be retired in favour of event-based packed hooks for 1.8 and beyond
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    com.mumfrey.liteloader.core.runtime.Obf.C01PacketChatMessage
    com.mumfrey.liteloader.core.runtime.Obf.C17PacketCustomPayload
    com.mumfrey.liteloader.core.runtime.Obf.S01PacketJoinGame
    com.mumfrey.liteloader.core.runtime.Obf.S02PacketChat
    com.mumfrey.liteloader.core.runtime.Obf.S02PacketLoginSuccess
    com.mumfrey.liteloader.core.runtime.Obf.S3FPacketCustomPayload
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.mumfrey.liteloader.core.Events.addChatFilter(Object)
    use LiteLoader.getInterfaceManager().registerListener(listener); instead
    com.mumfrey.liteloader.core.Events.addListener(LiteMod)
    Use LiteLoader.getInterfaceManager().registerListener() instead
    com.mumfrey.liteloader.client.ClientEvents.addTickListener(Object)
    use LiteLoader.getInterfaceManager().registerListener(listener); instead
    com.mumfrey.liteloader.core.Events.addTickListener(Object)
    use LiteLoader.getInterfaceManager().registerListener(listener); instead
    com.mumfrey.liteloader.core.LiteLoader.displayModInfoScreen(Object)
    use getModPanelManager().displayModInfoScreen(parentScreen); instead
    com.mumfrey.liteloader.core.LiteLoader.getConsoleStream()
    use log4j instead
    com.mumfrey.liteloader.core.LiteLoader.getDisplayModInfoScreenTab()
    use getModPanelManager().getDisplayModInfoScreenTab(); instead
    com.mumfrey.liteloader.core.LiteLoader.getEvents()
    DO NOT USE, register listeners with the interface manager instead!
    com.mumfrey.liteloader.core.LiteLoader.getLogger()
    use LiteLoaderLogger instead
    com.mumfrey.liteloader.api.LiteAPI.getPacketTransformers()
    com.mumfrey.liteloader.api.manager.APIAdapter.getPacketTransformers()
    com.mumfrey.liteloader.core.LiteLoader.getPermissionsManager()
    use getClientPermissionsManager instead
    com.mumfrey.liteloader.core.LiteLoader.getPluginChannels()
    use LiteLoader.getClientPluginChannels()
    com.mumfrey.liteloader.PreJoinGameListener.onPreJoinGame(INetHandler, S01PacketJoinGame)
    this event's return code is not compatible with other events expressing the same pattern, it will be replaced in the next release with a method whose return value is boolean to NOT cancel
    com.mumfrey.liteloader.util.ModUtilities.registerKey(KeyBinding)
    Deprecated : use LiteLoader.getInput().registerKeyBinding() instead
    com.mumfrey.liteloader.core.LiteLoader.registerModResourcePack(IResourcePack)
    Use LiteLoader.getGameEngine().registerResourcePack() instead
    com.mumfrey.liteloader.core.PluginChannels.sendMessage(String, byte[], PluginChannels.ChannelPolicy)
    Use ClientPluginChannels.sendMessage instead
    com.mumfrey.liteloader.util.ModUtilities.unRegisterKey(KeyBinding)
    Deprecated : use LiteLoader.getInput().unRegisterKeyBinding() instead
    com.mumfrey.liteloader.core.LiteLoader.unRegisterModResourcePack(IResourcePack)
    Use LiteLoader.getGameEngine().unRegisterResourcePack() instead
